statements: SELECT * FROM TaskSchedules WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_name FROM TaskSchedules WHERE task_id = 2;
SELECT schedule_time FROM TaskSchedules WHERE task_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM TaskSchedules WHERE task_name = 'Task A';
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM TaskSchedules WHERE task_name LIKE '%Task%';
SELECT * FROM TaskSchedules WHERE schedule_time > NOW();
SELECT * FROM TaskSchedules WHERE schedule_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT MAX(schedule_time) FROM TaskSchedules;
SELECT MIN(repeat_interval) FROM TaskSchedules;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TaskSchedules;
SELECT DISTINCT task_name FROM TaskSchedules;
SELECT * FROM TaskSchedules ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM TaskSchedules WHERE repeat_interval > INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT AVG(task_id) FROM TaskSchedules;
SELECT SUM(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM repeat_interval)) FROM TaskSchedules;
SELECT * FROM TaskSchedules WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM schedule_time) = 6;
SELECT * FROM TaskSchedules WHERE EXTRACT(DOW FROM schedule_time) = 0;
SELECT task_name, COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM TaskSchedules GROUP BY task_name;
SELECT * FROM TaskSchedules LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM TaskSchedules OFFSET 10;
SELECT * FROM TaskSchedules WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, schedule_time FROM TaskSchedules WHERE schedule_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM TaskSchedules ORDER BY schedule_time ASC;
SELECT task_name, repeat_interval FROM TaskSchedules WHERE repeat_interval BETWEEN '1 day' AND '1 month';
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM TaskSchedules WHERE task_name LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM TaskSchedules WHERE task_id IN (2, 5, 8);
SELECT DISTINCT task_name FROM TaskSchedules;
SELECT task_id, task_name, schedule_time FROM TaskSchedules WHERE schedule_time >= '2022-03-01' AND schedule_time < '2022-04-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tasks FROM TaskSchedules;
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM repeat_interval)) AS avg_interval FROM TaskSchedules;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM TaskSchedules WHERE repeat_interval < '1 week' ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM TaskSchedules WHERE schedule_time::date = CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT task_id, MAX(schedule_time) AS latest_schedule FROM TaskSchedules GROUP BY task_id;
SELECT * FROM TaskSchedules WHERE EXTRACT(DOW FROM schedule_time) = 1;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM TaskSchedules WHERE schedule_time >= '2022-05-01' AND schedule_time < '2022-05-15';
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM TaskSchedules WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM schedule_time) = 2022;
SELECT task_id, task_name, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM schedule_time) AS month FROM TaskSchedules GROUP BY task_id, task_name, month;
SELECT task_id, task_name, repeat_interval FROM TaskSchedules WHERE repeat_interval IS NULL;
SELECT task_id, task_name, schedule_time, repeat_interval FROM TaskSchedules WHERE schedule_time > '2022-06-01' AND repeat_interval IS NOT NULL;
SELECT task_id, task_name, schedule_time FROM TaskSchedules WHERE schedule_time < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT * FROM schedules;
SELECT schedule_id, task_name FROM schedules;
SELECT task_name, start_time, end_time FROM schedules;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, task_type FROM tasks;
SELECT schedule_id, task_id FROM schedules JOIN tasks ON schedules.task_name = tasks.task_name;
SELECT task_name, task_type, task_frequency FROM tasks WHERE task_type = 'Important';
SELECT task_name, start_time FROM schedules WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT schedule_id, end_time FROM schedules WHERE end_time <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT task_name, task_type, task_frequency FROM tasks ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, task_name, start_time FROM schedules ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM schedules WHERE task_name LIKE '%meeting%';
SELECT task_name, end_time FROM schedules WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM end_time) = 6;
SELECT task_name, task_type FROM tasks WHERE task_type IN ('Urgent', 'Critical');
SELECT DISTINCT task_name FROM schedules;
SELECT AVG(task_frequency) FROM tasks;
SELECT COUNT(schedule_id) FROM schedules;
SELECT schedule_id, task_name, task_type FROM schedules LEFT JOIN tasks ON schedules.task_name = tasks.task_name;
SELECT schedule_id, task_name, task_type FROM schedules RIGHT JOIN tasks ON schedules.task_name = tasks.task_name;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE task_name = 'Meeting';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM schedules WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE task_name LIKE 'Report%';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_type = 'Work' AND task_frequency = '1 day';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_frequency >= '3 hours';
SELECT schedule_id, task_name, start_time FROM schedules WHERE end_time < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_name LIKE '%Review%' OR task_name LIKE '%Analysis%';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_type IN ('Meeting', 'Presentation');
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_frequency = '30 minutes' AND task_type = 'Reminder';
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_type, task_frequency FROM tasks WHERE task_frequency BETWEEN '1 hour' AND '3 hours';
SELECT task_name, task_frequency FROM tasks WHERE task_frequency = '1 week';
SELECT schedule_id, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE task_name NOT LIKE '%Meeting%';
SELECT task_name, task_frequency FROM tasks WHERE task_type = 'Work' ORDER BY task_frequency ASC;
SELECT * FROM schedules JOIN tasks ON schedules.task_name = tasks.task_name;
SELECT task_name, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE task_name = 'Report' AND start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_name ILIKE '%important%' AND task_type = 'Task';
SELECT schedule_id, task_name, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE task_name = 'Presentation' AND (start_time < '2023-01-01' OR end_time > '2023-01-01');
SELECT count(*) FROM schedules WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT task_name FROM tasks;
SELECT * FROM lights_schedule;
SELECT task_name, start_time FROM lights_schedule;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM logs;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM logs;
SELECT task_description FROM lights_schedule WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM lights_schedule WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE action LIKE '%login%';
SELECT task_name, end_time FROM lights_schedule WHERE id = 2;
SELECT user_id, action FROM logs WHERE timestamp < '2022-06-01 12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'user';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM lights_schedule WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-07-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-07-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT action, timestamp FROM logs WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM lights_schedule WHERE end_time < '2022-09-30';
SELECT task_name FROM lights_schedule WHERE task_name = 'Cleaning Task';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM lights_schedule WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM lights_schedule WHERE end_time < '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT task_name, start_time, end_time FROM lights_schedule WHERE task_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT task_name, task_description, start_time FROM lights_schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT task_name, end_time FROM lights_schedule WHERE task_name LIKE '%meeting%' ORDER BY end_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND action = 'logout';
SELECT user_id, username, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' OR role = 'manager';
SELECT task_name, end_time FROM lights_schedule WHERE end_time < '2022-12-31' AND task_description NOT LIKE '%obsolete%';
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE role = 'admin');
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 123456;
SELECT task_name, start_time, end_time FROM lights_schedule WHERE task_name IN ('Meeting', 'Training', 'Presentation');
SELECT user_id, username, email, role FROM users WHERE role NOT IN ('admin', 'manager');
SELECT task_name, start_time, end_time FROM lights_schedule WHERE end_time < '2022-06-30' OR start_time > '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe');
SELECT * FROM lights_schedule;
SELECT light_name FROM lights_schedule WHERE turn_on_time < NOW();
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM schedule_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'john%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM schedule_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT light_name, turn_on_time, turn_off_time FROM lights_schedule WHERE turn_off_time < DATE_ADD(turn_on_time, INTERVAL 1 DAY);
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks WHERE task_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT task_id) AS unique_tasks FROM schedule_logs;
SELECT * FROM tasks LIMIT 5;
SELECT task_name, LENGTH(task_description) AS description_length FROM tasks;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM schedule_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT AVG(log_id) AS avg_log_id FROM schedule_logs;
SELECT MAX(log_timestamp) AS latest_log_timestamp FROM schedule_logs;
SELECT light_name, COUNT(*) AS usage_count FROM lights_schedule GROUP BY light_name;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM schedule_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING log_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM lights_schedule WHERE light_name = 'Living Room Light';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT task_name FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_name LIKE '%clean%';
SELECT * FROM lights_schedule WHERE turn_on_time < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM lights_schedule WHERE turn_off_time > '2021-12-01 12:00:00';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'admin' AND email = 'admin@example.com';
SELECT task_name FROM tasks WHERE task_id > 5 AND task_description IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM schedule_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM schedule_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT(light_name) FROM lights_schedule;
SELECT task_name, COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM schedule_logs GROUP BY task_name;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM schedule_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT(light_name), MIN(turn_on_time) AS earliest_time, MAX(turn_off_time) AS latest_time FROM lights_schedule GROUP BY light_name;
SELECT * FROM tasks JOIN schedule_logs ON tasks.task_id = schedule_logs.task_id WHERE tasks.task_name = 'Programming';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM schedule_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING log_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM LightSchedules;
SELECT light_id, scheduled_time FROM LightSchedules WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT schedule_id, scheduled_time FROM LightSchedules WHERE light_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ScheduleTypes;
SELECT schedule_type_name FROM ScheduleTypes WHERE schedule_type_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM TaskLogs;
SELECT task_id, execution_time FROM TaskLogs WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM Tasks;
SELECT task_name, description FROM Tasks WHERE is_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM TaskSchedules;
SELECT task_id, schedule_id FROM TaskSchedules WHERE day_of_week = 1;
SELECT light_id, task_id FROM LightSchedules JOIN Tasks ON LightSchedules.schedule_id = Tasks.task_id;
SELECT schedule_id, task_name FROM TaskSchedules JOIN Tasks ON TaskSchedules.task_id = Tasks.task_id;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM Tasks WHERE task_id IN (SELECT task_id FROM TaskSchedules WHERE day_of_week = 1);
SELECT * FROM LightSchedules UNION SELECT * FROM TaskSchedules;
SELECT * FROM TaskLogs ORDER BY execution_time DESC;
SELECT task_name, count(log_id) AS num_logs FROM Tasks JOIN TaskLogs ON Tasks.task_id = TaskLogs.task_id GROUP BY task_name;
SELECT task_id, MAX(execution_time) AS last_execution FROM TaskLogs GROUP BY task_id;
SELECT task_name, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,execution_time,NOW())) AS avg_execution_duration FROM Tasks JOIN TaskLogs ON Tasks.task_id = TaskLogs.task_id GROUP BY task_name;
SELECT light_id, COUNT(schedule_id) AS num_schedules FROM LightSchedules GROUP BY light_id HAVING num_schedules > 1;
SELECT * FROM LightSchedules WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT task_name, description FROM Tasks WHERE is_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT schedule_type_name, schedule_type_id FROM ScheduleTypes WHERE schedule_type_id > 5;
SELECT task_id, task_name, is_enabled FROM Tasks WHERE task_name LIKE '%update%';
SELECT task_id, task_name, description FROM Tasks WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM Tasks WHERE is_enabled = TRUE ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT log_id, task_id, execution_time FROM TaskLogs WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT task_id, schedule_id, day_of_week FROM TaskSchedules WHERE day_of_week = 1;
SELECT * FROM LightSchedules ls JOIN TaskSchedules ts ON ls.schedule_id = ts.schedule_id;
SELECT ls.light_id, ts.task_id FROM LightSchedules ls JOIN TaskSchedules ts ON ls.schedule_id = ts.schedule_id;
SELECT ls.light_id, ts.task_id, ts.day_of_week FROM LightSchedules ls JOIN TaskSchedules ts ON ls.schedule_id = ts.schedule_id WHERE ts.day_of_week = 3;
SELECT t1.task_id, t1.task_name, t2.task_name AS dependency FROM Tasks t1 JOIN Tasks t2 ON t1.task_id = t2.task_id;
SELECT ls.light_id, st.schedule_type_name FROM LightSchedules ls JOIN ScheduleTypes st ON ls.schedule_id = st.schedule_type_id;
SELECT ls.light_id, ts.task_id, t.task_name FROM LightSchedules ls JOIN TaskSchedules ts ON ls.schedule_id = ts.schedule_id JOIN Tasks t ON ts.task_id = t.task_id WHERE t.is_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT t.task_id, t.task_name, COUNT(tl.log_id) AS log_count FROM Tasks t LEFT JOIN TaskLogs tl ON t.task_id = tl.task_id GROUP BY t.task_id;
SELECT t.task_id, t.task_name, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM age(tl.execution_time, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))) AS avg_execution_time FROM Tasks t JOIN TaskLogs tl ON t.task_id = tl.task_id GROUP BY t.task_id;

SELECT t.task_id, t.task_name, COUNT(tl.log_id) AS log_count, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM age(tl.execution_time, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))) AS avg_execution_time FROM Tasks t LEFT JOIN TaskLogs tl ON t.task_id = tl.task_id GROUP BY t.task_id;

SELECT t.task_id, t.task_name, COUNT(tl.log_id) AS log_count, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM age(tl.execution_time, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))) AS avg_execution_time FROM Tasks t LEFT JOIN TaskLogs tl ON t.task_id = tl.task_id WHERE t.is_enabled = TRUE GROUP BY t.task_id;

SELECT t.task_id, t.task_name, COUNT(tl.log_id) AS log_count, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM age(tl.execution_time, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))) AS avg_execution_time FROM Tasks t LEFT JOIN TaskLogs tl ON t.task_id = tl.task_id WHERE tl.status = 'failed' GROUP BY t.task_id;

SELECT t.task_id, t.task_name, COUNT(tl.log_id) AS log_count, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM age(tl.execution_time, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))) AS avg_execution_time FROM Tasks t LEFT JOIN TaskLogs tl ON t.task_id = tl.task_id WHERE t.is_enabled = TRUE AND tl.status = 'completed' GROUP BY t.task_id;
